Pixel art, 200x200 tile, top-down orthographic cliff overlay only. Extremely simple Age of Empires 2 style. Straight east-west cliff segment spanning fully from left edge to right edge (no diagonals). The bottom (near) side is lower elevation; the top (far) side is higher rim/ground with sparse grass on the rim. Rocky cliff face on the low side only; no grass on the cliff face. Cliff line intersects the left and right edges at exact midpoints. Match thickness, palette, and line weight across all cliff sprites. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, clean silhouette, readable at a glance. Full-tile coverage, no border frame. Solid bright royal purple background (pure royal purple), full frame, no transparency.

Pixel art, 200x200 tile, top-down orthographic cliff overlay only. Extremely simple Age of Empires 2 style. Concave right-angle cliff corner (innie). Cliff legs run from the midpoint of the bottom edge up to the center, then turn right to the midpoint of the east edge (legs must intersect edges at exact midpoints; clean 90° turn, no diagonal bridge; slight bow ok). Low/drop occupies the north and west edges; only the bottom-right (southeast) quadrant is higher rim/ground with sparse grass on the rim. Rocky cliff face on the low side only; no grass on the cliff face. Match thickness, palette, and line weight across all cliff sprites. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, clean silhouette, readable at a glance. Full-tile coverage, no border frame. Solid bright royal purple background (pure royal purple), full frame, no transparency.

Pixel art, 200x200 tile, top-down orthographic cliff overlay only. Extremely simple Age of Empires 2 style. Convex right-angle cliff corner (outie). A cliff runs from the midpoint of the bottom edge up to the center, then turns right to the midpoint of the right edge (legs must intersect edges at exact midpoints; clean 90° turn, no diagonal bridge; slight bow ok). The bottom-right quadrant is lower elevation; the other three quadrants are higher elevation with sparse grass on the rim. Rocky cliff face on the low side only; no grass on the cliff face. Match thickness, palette, and line weight across all cliff sprites. Thick outlines, limited palette, no fine details, clean silhouette, readable at a glance. Full-tile coverage, no border frame. Solid bright royal purple background (pure royal purple), full frame, no transparency.
